Name: FTW Arms AN-94
Description: Time for the technical and engineering marvel that is the Avtomat Nikonova 94, formally known as the AN-94. Chambered in 5.45 x 39, this guns defining feature is its hyperburst. With a burst fire rate of 1800 rpm, this guns burst beats out the vector with a measly 1200 rpm. The full auto fire rate is a very controllable 600 RPM, making it usable at medium ranges.
